duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical expertise and the highest quality care in a compassionate way within the Emergency Department.
Quickly access and prioritize incoming patients, perform comprehensive nursing assessments, stabilize patients, and provide direct nursing care.
Supervise non-licensed nursing staff within the RN’s scope of practice and in accordance with established policies.
Provide patient education/follow-up care instructions and make necessary referrals.

education_certification.credential: Advanced Cardiac Life Support must be obtained within 30 days of employment start date. Basic Cardiac Life Support must be obtained within 30 days of employment start date. PALS Pediatric Adv Life Supt must be obtained within 30 days of employment start date. Satori Alternatives Manag Aggr must be obtained within 1 year of employment start date. Registered Nurse qualification required. BSN required.
